definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: calculate, reakon (NH Pi. J Aram. Pa. put a valuation, estimate; J Aram. [[שַׁעֲרָא]] interest, market-price; Ar. si9run market-price is loan-word Frä:189);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[בְּנַפְשׁוֹ כֶּן־הוּא]] ´[[כְּמוֹ־שׁ]]: Pr 23:7 as he has calculated in his soul, so is he, but dub.: De [[שׁׂעֵר]] as one who calculates; more radical conj. in Bi Toy.
